author: Trueblox
title: a nostalgic mighty micros set!
review:
Hello! i am trueblox gaming. my youtube link:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsb80_mgl-MGx3lBPDnln3g

Box/Instructions

the box is small. the same goes for the instructions.

Parts

not many parts. most of them are small.

Minifigures

comes with 2 minifigures, Robin and Bane. Robin comes wit ha grappling hook and Bane comes with a stick of dynamite. their legs are short, like the legs for the lego children.

The build

the build itself was very short. well, i guess you can tell that its short, because just look at how small the cars are!

The completed model

the completed model looked amazing. robins car is just fine, and banes driller is a bit more nostalgic. can you guess why? Yes! Banes driller looks just like a mini thunder driller!

Overall opinion

the set is nice. really wish that there whould be more buildings like dunno, a demolishable house or somethin'. but what can i say, im impressed by this little set!
